name: parkin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cake made with ginger, oatmeal, and black treacle, originally eaten in the north of England: Would you like a piece of parkin? She would make parkin and bring out a big tray of this sticky brown cake cut into lumps.
More examplesFewer examplesLunch was a sandwich, an apple, and a piece of parkin.Is there any parkin left?Parkin is traditionally from Yorkshire.
